labels.text: In 1984, during a period when academic institutions placed a rigorous focus on technical skills, Wang Peng, who was then a nineteen-year-old high school student, privately performed 84 as a way to escape the limits of painting. The conceptual artist asked two classmates to assist him and document the work. The performance lasted just over half an hour, during which time the artist covered his naked body with ink, then imprinted rolls of xuan paper. This is China’s first nude performance piece.

In 1984, in a period when academic institutions placed a rigorous focus on technical skills, Wang Peng, who was then a nineteen-year-old high-school student, privately performed 84 as a way to escape the limits of painting. The conceptual artist asked two classmates to assist him and document the work. The performance lasted just over half an hour, during which time the artist covered his naked body with ink, then imprinted on rolls of xuan paper. This was China’s first nude performance piece.
1984年的中國，學院派仍然偏重一絲不苟的藝術技巧；當時只有19歲的高中生王蓬，卻私底下進行了《84行為》，突破繪畫的界限。這位概念藝術家得到兩位同學協助，紀錄演出過程。演出全長大約半個小時，期間藝術家全身染上墨水，再於宣紙上印上作品。這是中國首次裸體行為藝術表演。
